mapper.select: SELECT g_id as gId, s_no AS sNo, e_no AS eNo, s_name AS sName, e_name AS eName, grade FROM ( grades AS g LEFT JOIN stu AS s ON g.s_id = s.s_id ) LEFT JOIN exam e ON g.e_id = e.e_id

SELECT g_id as gId, s_no AS sNo, e_no AS eNo, s_name AS sName, e_name AS eName, grade FROM ( grades AS g LEFT JOIN stu AS s ON g.s_id = s.s_id ) LEFT JOIN exam e ON g.e_id = e.e_id WHERE e_no =#{no} OR s_no =#{no} OR e_name like #{name} OR s_name like #{name} ;

SELECT g_id as gId, s_no AS sNo, e_no AS eNo, s_name AS sName, e_name AS eName, grade FROM ( grades AS g LEFT JOIN stu AS s ON g.s_id = s.s_id ) LEFT JOIN exam e ON g.e_id = e.e_id WHERE time_begin > #{mintime} AND time_begin <#{maxtime} and k_id =#{kId};
SELECT grade FROM ( grades AS g LEFT JOIN stu AS s ON g.s_id = s.s_id ) LEFT JOIN exam e ON g.e_id = e.e_id WHERE g_id=#{g_id}
SELECT grade FROM grades WHERE e_id IN ( SELECT e_id FROM examiners WHERE examCard = #{examcard} ) AND s_id IN ( SELECT e_id FROM examiners WHERE examCard = #{examcard} );
mapper.update: update grades SET grade=#{grade} where s_id=#{sId} and e_id=#{eId};
